custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM EDWF_WorkflowInstance WI LEFT OUTER JOIN User_ U ON WI.userId = U.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN EDWF_Workflow W ON W.workflowId = WI.workflowId
SELECT WI.*, W.title AS workflowTitle, U.screenName FROM EDWF_WorkflowInstance WI LEFT OUTER JOIN EDWF_Workflow W ON W.workflowId = WI.workflowId LEFT OUTER JOIN User_ U ON WI.userId = U.userId

WHERE 1 = 1 <isNotEmpty property="workflowId"> AND W.workflowId = #workflowId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="companyId"> AND WI.companyId = #companyId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="status"> AND WI.status = #status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND U.userId = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="title"> AND WI.title LIKE '%@@title@@%' </isNotEmpty> ORDER BY WI.workflowInstanceId DESC <isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT A.*, B.title AS parentTitle, B.isPublic AS parentIsPublic, B.userId AS parentUserId, U.screenName AS screenName FROM EDWF_Workflow A LEFT OUTER JOIN EDWF_Workflow B ON A.parentWorkflowId = B.workflowId LEFT OUTER JOIN User_ U ON A.userId = U.userId

WHERE <isNotEmpty property="companyId"> A.companyId = #companyId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="targetLanguage"> AND A.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="title"> AND A.title LIKE '%@@title@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.userId = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="isPublic"> AND A.isPublic = #isPublic# </isNotEmpty> ORDER BY A.createDate DESC <isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>
